novels.title: Pride and Prejudice
novels.author: Jane Austen
novels.synopsis: The romantic clash between the opinionated Elizabeth Bennet and the proud Mr. Darcy. A timeless tale of love, reputation, and class in Regency England.

novels.author: George Orwell
novels.synopsis: A chilling dystopia where Big Brother watches everyone. Winston Smith struggles against the totalitarian regime of Oceania in a world where truth is manipulated.

novels.title: The Great Gatsby
novels.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
novels.synopsis: The mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful Daisy Buchanan. A tragedy of the Jazz Age and the American Dream.

novels.title: Moby Dick
novels.author: Herman Melville
novels.synopsis: Captain Ahab's obsessive quest for revenge against the white whale, Moby Dick, that bit off his leg. A seafaring epic of madness and nature.

novels.title: War and Peace
novels.author: Leo Tolstoy
novels.synopsis: A panoramic study of early 19th-century Russian society, noted for its mastery of realistic detail and variety of psychological analysis.

novels.title: Crime and Punishment
novels.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
novels.synopsis: Raskolnikov, an impoverished student, formulates a plan to kill an unscrupulous pawnbroker, exploring themes of morality, guilt, and redemption.

novels.title: The Brothers Karamazov
novels.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
novels.synopsis: A passionate philosophical novel that enters deeply into the ethical debates of God, free will, and morality through the lens of a fractured family.

novels.title: Animal Farm
novels.author: George Orwell
novels.synopsis: A group of farm animals rebel against their human farmer, hoping to create a society where the animals can be equal, free, and happy.

novels.title: Fahrenheit 451
novels.author: Ray Bradbury
novels.synopsis: In a future American society where books are outlawed and 'firemen' burn any that are found, Guy Montag begins to question his existence.

novels.title: Jane Eyre
novels.author: Charlotte Bronte
novels.synopsis: The story of a young orphan who survives a bleak childhood to become a governess, finding love with the brooding Mr. Rochester.

scifi.title: Dune
scifi.author: Frank Herbert
scifi.synopsis: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Paul Atreides must navigate political intrigue and destiny to become the mysterious Kwisatz Haderach.

scifi.title: Ender's Game
scifi.author: Orson Scott Card
scifi.synopsis: A military genius child is recruited to prepare for a future alien invasion, training in a complex battle simulation room.

scifi.title: The Martian
scifi.author: Andy Weir
scifi.synopsis: Astronaut Mark Watney is stranded on Mars after a fierce storm. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity to survive.

scifi.title: Neuromancer
scifi.author: William Gibson
scifi.synopsis: A washed-up computer hacker is hired by a mysterious employer for one last run against a powerful artificial intelligence.

scifi.title: Foundation
scifi.author: Isaac Asimov
scifi.synopsis: Hari Seldon uses psychohistory to predict the fall of the Galactic Empire and creates a Foundation to preserve knowledge and shorten the dark age.

scifi.title: Hyperion
scifi.author: Dan Simmons
scifi.synopsis: On the world called Hyperion, beyond the law of the Hegemony of Man, there waits the creature called the Shrike.

scifi.title: Snow Crash
scifi.author: Neal Stephenson
scifi.synopsis: In reality, Hiro Protagonist delivers pizza. In the Metaverse, he's a warrior prince. A new virus is striking down hackers everywhere.

scifi.title: Dark Matter
scifi.author: Blake Crouch
scifi.synopsis: Jason Dessen is abducted into a world where his life is completely different. He must fight to return to his true family through the multiverse.

scifi.title: Ready Player One
scifi.author: Ernest Cline
scifi.synopsis: In a dystopian 2045, the world escapes into the OASIS. Wade Watts discovers the first clue to a treasure left by the creator.

scifi.title: Project Hail Mary
scifi.author: Andy Weir
scifi.synopsis: Ryland Grace is the sole survivor on a desperate, last-chance missionâ€”and if he fails, humanity and the earth itself will perish.

mystery.title: Sherlock Holmes
mystery.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
mystery.synopsis: The adventures of the world's most famous consulting detective as he solves impossible crimes with his friend Dr. John Watson in Victorian London.

mystery.title: Gone Girl
mystery.author: Gillian Flynn
mystery.synopsis: On their fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne's wife Amy disappears. Under pressure from the police and media, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble.

mystery.title: The Da Vinci Code
mystery.author: Dan Brown
mystery.synopsis: A murder in the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci's paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years.

mystery.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
mystery.author: Stieg Larsson
mystery.synopsis: Disgraced journalist Mikael Blomkvist is hired to investigate a disappearance from 40 years ago, aided by the pierced and tattooed punk computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

mystery.title: And Then There Were None
mystery.author: Agatha Christie
mystery.synopsis: Ten strangers are lured to a solitary island mansion off the coast of Devon. When a host fails to appear, they are killed off one by one.

mystery.title: The Silent Patient
mystery.author: Alex Michaelides
mystery.synopsis: Alicia Berenson shoots her husband five times in the face and then never speaks another word. Theo Faber, a psychotherapist, becomes obsessed with uncovering her motive.

mystery.title: Big Little Lies
mystery.author: Liane Moriarty
mystery.synopsis: A murder investigation reveals the secrets, lies, and betrayals behind the perfect lives of three mothers in a wealthy beachside community.

mystery.title: In Cold Blood
mystery.author: Truman Capote
mystery.synopsis: A non-fiction novel detailing the 1959 murders of four members of the Clutter family in Holcomb, Kansas, and the capture and execution of the killers.

mystery.title: Murder on the Orient Express
mystery.author: Agatha Christie
mystery.synopsis: Just after midnight, the famous Orient Express is stopped by a snowdrift. By morning, a passenger lies dead, stabbed twelve times, his door locked from the inside.

mystery.title: Sharp Objects
mystery.author: Gillian Flynn
mystery.synopsis: Fresh from a brief stay at a psych hospital, reporter Camille Preaker faces a troubling assignment: she must return to her tiny hometown to cover the murders of two preteen girls.

webnovels.title: Shadow Slave
webnovels.author: Guiltythree
webnovels.synopsis: Growing up in poverty, Sunny never expected anything good from life. However, even he did not anticipate being chosen by the Nightmare Spell and becoming one of the Awakened.

webnovels.title: The Beginning After The End
webnovels.author: TurtleMe
webnovels.synopsis: King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power.

webnovels.title: Lord of the Mysteries
webnovels.author: Cuttlefish
webnovels.synopsis: In the waves of steam and machinery, who can achieve extraordinary? In the fogs of history and darkness, who is whispering? Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries.

webnovels.title: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint
webnovels.author: Sing Shong
webnovels.synopsis: Only I know the end of this world. One day our MC finds himself stuck in the world of his favorite webnovel. What does he do to survive? It is a world struck by catastrophe.

webnovels.title: Reverend Insanity
webnovels.author: Gu Zhen Ren
webnovels.synopsis: A story of a villain, Fang Yuan, who was reborn 500 years into the past with the Spring Autumn Cicada he painstakingly refined. With his profound wisdom, battle, and life experiences.

webnovels.title: Author's POV
webnovels.author: Entrail_JI
webnovels.synopsis: The person who knows the plot of the story better than anyone else is the author. A writer is transported into his own novel, but not as the protagonist.

webnovels.title: Swordmaster's Youngest Son
webnovels.author: AZI
webnovels.synopsis: Jin Runcandel was the youngest son of the greatest swordmaster. He was kicked out of their clan for his lack of talent, but encounters a god who gives him a second chance.

webnovels.title: Infinite Mage
webnovels.author: Kim Chi-woo
webnovels.synopsis: Found abandoned in a stable, Shirone was raised by commoners. Despite his lowly status, he possessed an incredible talent for magic and dreams of becoming an Infinite Mage.

webnovels.title: Star Embracing Swordsmaster
webnovels.author: Q10
webnovels.synopsis: Vlad, a slum dweller who dreamed of becoming a knight. One day, his fate changes when he encounters a mysterious black star.

webnovels.title: Second Life Ranker
webnovels.author: Sadoyeon
webnovels.synopsis: Yeon-woo had a twin brother who disappeared five years ago. One day, a pocket watch left by his brother returned to him, revealing the secrets of the Obelisk.
